tool_description: With a few lines of code, your customers can start printing their or your designs locally - at 3D printers in their neighborhood. Add the following to your site where desired:
name: makexyz
title: makexyz

api_list.name: upload
api_list.description: The user's file will be uploaded to makexyz, and the API will return a link to the page where the file has been uploaded. The user can then proceed to makexyz to checkout… and enjoy the wonders of printing locally.
